Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Overlord Gunship
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
In GrimWorld 40,000, the Overlord Gunship is a formidable aerial juggernaut symbolizing the Imperium's dominance. Adorned with battle-worn plating, it bears scars from countless dogfights, emphasizing its role in the ongoing war. Armed with devastating weaponry for anti-aircraft and ground assaults, it embodies the relentless spirit of the Imperium, guarding against threats in the perilous theater of GrimWorld 40,000. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x40
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
